name: StarSharks
description: StarSharks(SSS) is a community-driven shark metaverse where players, developers and investors could define the value evolution of underlying NFTs in a sustainable ecosystem. This project aims to cultivate and share value of content with the community, and to disrupt the current GameFi world where assets are isolated in one game. StarSharks is powered with dual-token system: SSS, governance token; and SEA, game token. StarSharks consists of four modular assets: 1) Underlying game NFTs. 2) Evolving games defined by the community. 3) NFT markets with built-in rental systems and 4) revenue pool governed by the community. StarSharks was founded in 2021 by a team with previous star performers from Timi Studio ,Google and Binance. To learn more about this project, check out StarSharks's website: https://starsharks.com/
